Package client.Controllers

Class SignupController

java.lang.Object
client.Controllers.SignupController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SignupController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Signup in SBUgram! This controller handles all the occurrences in the signup menu.

with the help of the methods of this class a User signs up and connects to the server.

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SignupController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    this method is called before all of the other methods and sets the default profilePic for the user.
    void pickADate()
    sets a date when the datePicker is clicked.
    void returnToLoginMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    there is a button in the app to return to main menu and here is it's method.
    void saveAnswerAndQuestion()
    choosing a security question is optional but when it is chosen , this method saves the question and the answer of the user.
    void setProfilePic()
    if the user tends to use a profile picture, this method is called and a pic is chosen from his,her computer files!
    void show()
    this method is actually a trick for showing the password when the user clicks on the showPass check box.
    void signup​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    most important method in this class which handles the user signing in when he/she selects the signUp button.

  • Constructor Details

    • SignupController

      public SignupController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      this method is called before all of the other methods and sets the default profilePic for the user. it also prepares questions for the security question section.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • signup

      public void signup​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      most important method in this class which handles the user signing in when he/she selects the signUp button. it saves the information of the user and sends it to the server.
      Parameters:
      event - event which we tend to control.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • show

      public void show()
      this method is actually a trick for showing the password when the user clicks on the showPass check box. the normal textField is shown when the user chooses the checkbox.

    • pickADate

      public void pickADate()
      sets a date when the datePicker is clicked.

    • setProfilePic

      public void setProfilePic()
      if the user tends to use a profile picture, this method is called and a pic is chosen from his,her computer files!

    • returnToLoginMenu

      public void returnToLoginMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      there is a button in the app to return to main menu and here is it's method.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • saveAnswerAndQuestion

      public void saveAnswerAndQuestion()
      choosing a security question is optional but when it is chosen , this method saves the question and the answer of the user.
